title: A Visit to the Doctor
description: Emma talks about visiting a doctor and how she plans to take better care of her health.
speaker: Emma
text: Last week, I did not feel very well for a few days.
I had a headache and felt tired most of the time.
After work, I decided to visit a doctor to check the problem.
The doctor asked me some questions and listened carefully.
He said that I needed more rest and should drink more water.
He also advised me to sleep earlier and take short breaks during the day.
After the visit, I felt more relaxed and less worried.
From now on, I am going to take better care of my health.
